summary: The implementation covers most requirements comprehensively. Services and products pages display data from backend with proper retrieval and display. The service request form includes all required fields with validation and success confirmation. Backend implements stable types, CRUD operations, and stores service requests. Frontend applies a tech-focused visual theme with slate grays and electric green accents. Generated brand images (logo and hero background) are properly referenced in the code. However, several acceptance criteria are not fully met: no evidence of 3-5 pre-populated repair services in backend, no product categorization, no service request status tracking (pending/in-progress/completed), no contact information field in the form, and no stable variables for data persistence across upgrades.

missing_requirements.requirement: Display at least 3-5 common repair services pre-populated in the backend
missing_requirements.reason: Backend defines service CRUD operations but does not initialize or pre-populate 3-5 common repair services (hardware repair, software troubleshooting, virus removal, data recovery, upgrades). The services Map starts empty.

missing_requirements.requirement: Products are categorized (e.g., laptops, desktops, components)
missing_requirements.reason: Product type lacks a category field. No categorization system is implemented in backend types or frontend display.
ServiceRequestForm only includes customerName, deviceDetails, and issueDescription. No contact information field (email, phone) is present.

missing_requirements.requirement: Store service requests with status tracking (pending, in-progress, completed)
missing_requirements.reason: ServiceRequest type does not include a status field. No status tracking mechanism is implemented.

missing_requirements.requirement: Use stable variables to persist data across canister upgrades
missing_requirements.reason: Backend uses non-stable Map variables (services, products, requests). No stable keyword or system pre/post upgrade hooks are present.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend includes deleteService, deleteProduct, and cancelServiceRequest functions
hallucinated_features.reason: Delete/cancel operations for services, products, and service requests were not requested in any requirement. Only CRUD with read operations and service request submission were specified.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend includes getService, getProduct, and getServiceRequest functions for retrieving individual items by ID
hallucinated_features.reason: Requirements only specify retrieval of all services/products and no mention of individual item retrieval by ID.
